title: 1 Month Free On A Fully Furnished Studio! Call For Details!
map_address: 7100 W Alexander Rd near Alexander and Tenaya
posting_body: ['The 95 Apartments', '7100 West Alexander Rd', 'Las Vegas, NV 89129', 'The 95 offers quiet comfort with quaint studios with Murphy beds, as well as spacious one- and two-bedroom apartments.', 'All our apartments come with fully appointed kitchens, dishwasher, microwave, breakfast bar and walk-in closets.', 'The community amenities feature sparkling swimming pool for relaxing, convenient on-site laundry facilities, a pet park and covered parking.', 'Call today to schedule your private tour!', 'Please visit our community and check out our spacious studio floor plan.', 'Apartment #2041FURN: $1774 a month on a 12-month lease includes water/sewer/trash/internet/cable', '**Sign a 6 month lease or longer and get 1 month free!', '**', 'Community Amenities', 'Organic Vegetable Garden • Easy Access to Red Rock and Mt. Charleston • Energy Star Certified • Covered Parking • Laundry Facilities • Night Patrol •', 'On-Site Maintenance • On-Site Management •', 'Pool • Public Transportation', 'Amenities', 'Home Wi-Fi Ready with Pre-Installed Modem and 1st Month Free, provided by COX • Signature LUX Series • Signature Modern Series • Fully Furnished • Air Conditioner •', 'Cable Ready • Carpeting •', 'Disposal • Electronic Thermostat • Microwave • Refrigerator • Window Coverings', 'Monday: 9AM-5:30PM', 'Tuesday:', '9AM-5:30PM', 'Wednesday: 9AM-5:30PM', 'Thursday: 9AM-5:30PM', 'Friday:', '9AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday: 9AM-5:30PM', 'Walk-Ins are welcomed!', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed Comments: Pet Friendly!', 'Pet Fee: $150.00 (Non-Refundable), Additional Pet(s): $150.00 each (Non-Refundable), Monthly Pet Rent: $30.00/1 pet; $50.00/2 pets; (Limit 2).', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Call for Details!', 'Restrictions: Pit Bull, Staffordshire Terrier, Rottweiler, Doberman Pinscher, Chow, Malamute, Akita, Wolf-Hybrids, and any mix containing any of these breeds.']
